head_commit.message:
VPN-4711 Conda / Android.  (#6923)

* conda android

* Auto stash before rebase of "refs/heads/basti/cmake_cleanup"

* Fix NDK Version, add docs

* Try to add a conda-base-ish docker image

* fix base immage?

* no pip calls

* proper conda invoke

* fix command

* add python deps to docker image

* MORE dependencies

* Attempt 1: Use that conda base image for android

* add cache back

* add conda to path

* init the conda shell?

* fix init of conda, hopefully this time c:

* okay docker run is not using bash, my bad

* it's c not C

* it's the script, duh

* accept licence

* look at me, i'm dumb

* use base image?

* no doupe volume

* huh wierd

* WIERD - why is the cache not empty

* ugh anyway, just diable caching for the moment

* try to init conda

* call stuff in a login shell?

* it's running - now fix lupdate

* add curl, duh

* add ccache to base

* cleanups

* remove curl from env.yml

* Add adb to conda-path

* Better docs

* Update scripts/android/conda_setup_qt.sh

Co-authored-by: Gela <gela@mozilla.com>

* Add link to emulator

* Spelling issues

* add a trimming script to conda

* Smaller base conda image

* maybe without that it will run?

* clean conda cache, so the image will get smaller for real

* do not build all android things for now...

* what is going on..

* Ignore: Taskcluster Debugging PR! (#7114)

* okay testing

* YOLO LETS PACK IT

* fix perms

* oh, press yes, sure.

* am i in the wrong folder?

* fix the artifact name

* fix activate script invoke

* Use activation scripts for portable enviroments

* fix build script

* keep compilers??

* PROGRESS

* WORKING, okay now let's wrapp up

* revert wrong stuff

* revert build script changes

* fix armv7

---------

Co-authored-by: Gela <gela@mozilla.com>
